name: Hentai Shooter 3D: Christmas Party
description: It's the New Year surprise for all admirers of Wolfenstein and Doom! The humorous 3D shooter in the best traditions of the old school. Meet hottest ladies, from the parallel world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 200 MB available space
